text: Customer reported login issue with mobile app version 2.1.3. Unable to authenticate using email/password combination. Issue occurs on iOS devices only.
Feature request: Add bulk export functionality for user data. Customers need ability to export all conversation history as CSV or JSON format.
Knowledge base article: How to integrate ADRI with LangChain. Step-by-step guide for adding @adri_protected decorator to LangChain tools and chains.
Bug report: Data validation fails on empty string fields. When optional field contains empty string instead of null, validator incorrectly flags as invalid.
Product update announcement: ADRI v5.0.0 released with environment-based standards, workflow orchestration, and enhanced CLI tools. Breaking change: standard parameter now required.
